New Records: Suryakumar Yadav won the match in the Super Over with a four on the first delivery
Key Match Events: The match went into a Super Over after Sri Lanka tied the score
Suryakumar Yadav and Shubman Gill played key roles in the Super Over
Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka won the toss and opted to field first
Chamindu Wickramasinghe came in for Dasun Sanaka
Hardik Pandya, Axar Patel, Rishabh Pant, and Arshdeep Singh were rested
Post-Match Reflections: Shubman Gill and Suryakumar Yadav were praised for their performances
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was the third in the series
Others: The match was played at Pallekele International Cricket Stadium
